frontmatter.title: Github Responds to Request to Take Down 'youtube-dl' Library

node.excerpt: Github  reinstated  on Monday the  youtube-dl  repository, a popular Python library used to download youtube videos and audio.  Github is a web platform that hosts code repositories. Github was purchased by Microsoft in 2018 for  $7.5 billion . Some of the code hosted on Github is free for anyone t…
